comment: Project-specific quality gates - copy to project .claude/settings.local.json

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo '[Hook] Running quality gates...' >&2

# Adjust paths and commands for your project
cd apps/web || exit 1

# Type check
echo '[Hook] Type checking...' >&2
tsc --noEmit --skipLibCheck || { echo '[Hook] ❌ Type check failed' >&2; exit 1; }

# Tests
echo '[Hook] Running tests...' >&2
bun test || { echo '[Hook] ❌ Tests failed' >&2; exit 1; }

# Lint
echo '[Hook] Linting...' >&2
bun run check || { echo '[Hook] ⚠️  Lint warnings' >&2; }

echo '[Hook] ✓ Quality gates passed' >&2
cat

PreToolUse.description: Run quality gates before git commit
